topic.fullpath: Topic :: System :: Systems Administration :: Authentication/Directory :: LDAP

name: LAAAD
short_description: This is a collection of modules and HOWTOs that allow Active Directory to be extended and provide support for LDAP/SSL authentication of Linux hosts, setup a local homedir footprint for Linux users and mount their smbfs remote homedir on login.
